sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-row no-gutters>
      <v-col sm="4" class="pa-3" v-for="product in products" :key="product._id">
        <router-link :to="'/detail-pro/' + product._id" class="btn btn-primary">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title class="headline">{{this.$route.params._id}}</v-card-title>
          </v-card>
        </router-link>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import API from "../api";
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      products: [],
    };
  },
  async created() {
    const res = await API.getProductByID(this.$route.params._id);
    this.products = res;
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
